examples.example: 为了实现自己的理想，他一直坚持不懈地努力奋斗着。

translate.english: In order to realize his own ideal, he has been persevering in striving hard.

examples.example: 我的理想是成为一名优秀的科学家，为人类的进步贡献自己的力量。

translate.english: My ideal is to become an excellent scientist and contribute my own strength to the progress of mankind.

examples.example: 拥有远大的理想就像拥有了一座灯塔，指引着我们不断前进。

translate.english: Having a lofty ideal is like having a lighthouse, guiding us to keep moving forward.
